Name: Bulbasaur
Entry: For some time after its birth, it uses the nutrients that are packed into the seed on its back in order to grow.

Name: Ivysaur
Entry: The more sunlight Ivysaur bathes in, the more strength wells up within it, allowing the bud on its back to grow larger.

Name: Vensaur
Entry: While it basks in the sun, it can convert the light into energy. As a result, it is more powerful in the summertime.
